title: 111: Harold Bloom, Clearly a Gardener
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The recent passing of Harold necessitates a bit of a memorial from the Classical Stuff boys. In this episode we discuss Harold's legacy, anxiety, and reading.
itunes:author: Violet, Daisy, and Daffodil
itunes:subtitle: He certainly doesn't care about books
